about_the_game:
Ultimate NPCs - Skullduggery (PFRPG)


This book was written to be a resource to Game Masters and Players alike. It contains a wealth of information for developing plot points, character behaviors, histories, guilds, and many other valuable assets designed to aid in the running and playing of fantasy role playing games.

This module includes 30 finely crafted NPCs at levels 1, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20 making 180 unique characters with:

  • back stories
  • personality traits
  • role playing cues
  • unique items
  • unique spells
  • Including 8 generic NPCs

Requires: An active subscription or 1-time standard or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds and the included Pathfinder ruleset.

Conversion by: Danny Stratton
